Shortcuts

Detection

ACTION MOUSE POSITION MOUSE / KEY BUTTON
Mark start-point of the event Within the channel Left mouse button
Mark end-point of the event Within the channel Left mouse button
Change start/end-point of the event Current line Keep right mouse button pressed and move the current line
Delete event In the center of the event SHIFT-Button pressed + left mouse button
Event name In the center of the event Right mouse button

Close file F8
